title: U.S. of Gay
description: Homosexuals giving makeovers to Trump supporters.
quote: It’s after Labor Day! What are you doing with all this white?
altHero: three men stand outside a home with a Trump lawn sign
alt1: the gang pulls up to a house covered in Trump signs and Confederate flags
alt2: two white men and a woman wearing ratty clothes, Trump hats, and American flag paraphernalia
alt3: the Black cast member gives a “hell no” look
alt4: cast member pulls a KKK hood from the closet
